Articles.Content:
So guys, anything else you think might need a little tweaking, any possible questions, and ideas?

Just have everyone fill out the diplomacy stuff and I'm set

I just thought of a thing we can all do with our individual youtube channels. Each of us can make propaganda videos, news reels, or other such things in order to simulate what corporations such as ours would put out in order to win public opinion, inform their supporters of victories, etc. It will also help add to the story as the viewers can learn the perspective of each corp on certain issues and/or battles

Edited November 13, 2014 by choninja21

I just thought of a thing we can all do with our individual youtube channels. Each of us can make propaganda videos, news reels, or other such things in order to simulate what corporations such as ours would put out in order to win public opinion, inform their supporters of victories, etc. It will also help add to the story as the viewers can learn the perspective of each corp on certain issues and/or battles

You sir get a gold star.
O yea, guys, Ion is wayyyyy to expensive for what we are doing! Do you guys think we should give it a discount?

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Warning! Epiphany alert!

Guys, I just thought of something. I realize that avoiding kerbals is going to be very hard and I don't want the ksp police to come after every battle, so I thought of a way around this. We don't have to get rid of the ksp police.

Here is the idea: (warning it may be a bit dark, but it will justify everything.)

1) Kerban is in a state of depression. Currently the economy is very poor, making people take any job they can get and the government restrictions on jobs lowers, so there can be more jobs and the economy can be boosted.

2) This makes it so people would be willing to become part of our "military" especially when we all try to avoid killing. The poor economy can also help explain why the ships are so cheap! (AKA only pay cost of the ship and not launchers, and explains discounts!)

3) This means that we are able to do this, because it will create a whole lot more jobs and raise the need for scientists. Not to mention the expensive stuff being brought back!

4) This would help cause 2 things.

a) We can do propoganda about each others corps to gain favor and more support, we can do "incidents" on kerban that stir up the heat for war and this adds a bit more competition, but mainly, because we want the better people on our side.

This could lead into the creation of factions and stuff and not to mention into a entire story arc if we do it right (hint hint, wink wink, nudge nudge, kick kick, punch punch)

Also note, that the corp personality doesn't create your whole personality, it is just your beginning stance. We are all still playing living beings (kerbals) and we can all be reasonable

Start the propoganda plans and start the story arc writing!

Guys, I just thought of something. I realize that avoiding kerbals is going to be very hard and I don't want the ksp police to come after every battle, so I thought of a way around this. We don't have to get rid of the ksp police.

Here is the idea: (warning it may be a bit dark, but it will justify everything.)

1) Kerban is in a state of depression. Currently the economy is very poor, making people take any job they can get and the government restrictions on jobs lowers, so there can be more jobs and the economy can be boosted.

2) This makes it so people would be willing to become part of our "military" especially when we all try to avoid killing. The poor economy can also help explain why the ships are so cheap! (AKA only pay cost of the ship and not launchers, and explains discounts!)

3) This means that we are able to do this, because it will create a whole lot more jobs and raise the need for scientists. Not to mention the expensive stuff being brought back!

in Depression the police will have less funding and cant respond to every call in the solar system. Also this has some historicalness(is that a word?) the depression in Europe gave way to powerful fascists(the corps in this instance). There could be some tension because all the corps have different ideas on how to deal with the economy.

it seems that changes to the timeline should be made then if we are to use this storyline

I was thinking we should have the intro to all our vids include a segment in which a kerbal is planting our flags on our respective surfaces

respective surfaces? Please elaborate.

also we have had a request to add this mod:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89072-0-25-Kerbsplosions-Pre-Alpha-2

I would personally like to keep from adding mods, but it is a group decision never the less.
Traders, I know you guys want planets, but could you guys please consider sharing a planet, take the mun if you want, but I would like to keep a good amount of planets free.

respective surfaces? Please elaborate.

I mean the planets we control, for example delfiler would plant his flag on Moho, i would plant mine on Eeloo
